metadata.dc:author: Lorenzo, María A
Márquez, Carlos J
Guzmán, Wilmer
metadata.dc:description: A group of substituted 1-benzyl-3-carbethoxy-2-quinolones, whose design was based on the structures of well established antimitotics, were synthesized by a three reactions sequence. Although the yields of the first reaction (condensation of o-nitrobenzaldehydes with diethyl malonate) could not be improved, the synthetic route turned out quite efficient.
metadata.dc:title: Potenciales antimitóticos. 2. Sintesis de 1-bencil-3-carboetoxi-2-quinolonas.
[Potential antimitotics. 2. Synthesis of 1-benzyl-3-carbethoxy-2-quinolones].
